availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anderson Rowan Byers (Grayson County, Kentucky, physician and soldier)

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Lived in Grayson County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to to Elizabeth Park Byers. Father of Mary E Byers, Jesse Anderson Byers, Charles C. Byers, Erasmus B. Byers, and Otha E. Byers. Physician in Grayson County in 1860. First lieutenant in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from October 1863 to December 1864.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 363.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 111.
